markdown:
| icon              = poe2 breastplate_armor_pallegina_disgraced icon.png
| description       = Pallegina had gone against the ducs bels' orders by inventing a new trade arrangement with the anamenfath to accommodate the recovering Dyrwoodan market. As a result, the Dyrwood and the Vailian Republics were plunged into a trade war.

For her outrageous insubordination and audacity, Pallegina was banished from the Republics. The five suns representing the five ducs bels were scraped from the face of her breastplate, an enduring mark of her disgrace.
| added_in          = poe2
| equipment_slot    = Armor
| armor_type        = Breastplate
| armor_category    = Medium armor
| requirements      =

| is_unique         = yes

| rel_quests        = The Child of Five Suns
| rel_items         = Honor Guard Breastplate (Pallegina){{!}}Honor Guard Breastplate;Five Suns Breastplate;Desgraza Breastplate

| guid              = d8c68d77-f383-4b4a-9310-29421bd0ab2a
| location          = * Worn by [Pallegina](/pallegina/) (if she was disgraced in {{poe1}}, and was not pardoned as a result of the Watcher not distributing the souls to the Dyrwood)
}}
